name: Squamble
overview: A surprisingly addictive remake of Konami's classic shmup "Scramble". Game written in 68K assembly language. Coding by John T. Kennedy. Graphics by Colin Turner (XJ600) and John T. Kennedy. Music by Darren Irvine. Released in several magazines including Amiga User Int'l (Vol. 5 No. 7) (AUI superdisk #2), July 1991, Amiga Power #10 (coverdisk 10), Feb 1992, and also in Magazine Publisher 3: Amiga Action #67 (coverdisk 2), Feb 1995.
